about_the_game:
Survive Nature Dungeons: battle fantasy creatures who are taking the books and harming the readers. Rescue the Books of Power too! Once you rescue 27 Books of Power you unlock the the final bosses.

Cozy Book Sanctuary: heal between battles and help books and readers get where they need to go. Enter a battle gate and you get to choose your Battle Promise. Low difficulties are safer, you keep more when KO'd but earn less reward. High difficulty will earn more powerful loot but if you get KO'd you'll loose all your stuff.

Story


How did the most powerful library in the galaxy become a place of battle? One day, three troublesome creatures attacked the turtle's ultimate library. They caused the turtle-beings to mysteriously disappear, and captured the living books of power. Now the three bosses have sent their armies of creatures to finish their takeover of Word Turtle Island.



Portia, the book of portals, managed to escape. Now, she searches Word Turtle Island for someone to help her rescue the turtles, books and the readers caught in the catastrophe.

Wort, far away at the edge of Word Turtle Island, is about to leave to seek a different turtle path when Portia finds him. Wort learns he is the last of the Word Turtle beings.



It is now up to Wort and Portia (and you) to take back Word Turtle Island!



Play using any combination of game controller, touch screen/mouse, or keyboard for typing words.

Features


  • More than 10,000 words in the game's curated playful positive dictionary
  • Typing is optional yet celebrated giving you bonuses and feedback scores showing your typing speed and accuracy at the end of each battle
  • 11 powers and 13 word weapons, all of which can be leveled up

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or Higher
  • Processor: x86_64 CPU with SSE4.2 instructions, with 4 physical cores or more: Intel Core i5-6600K, AMD Ryzen 5 1600
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics with full Vulkan 1.0 support: Intel HD Graphics 5500 (Broadwell), AMD Radeon R5 Graphics (Kaveri)
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or Higher
  • Processor: x86_64 CPU with SSE4.2 instructions, with 4 physical cores or more: Intel Core i5-6600K, AMD Ryzen 5 1600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Dedicated graphics with full Vulkan 1.2 support: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 (Pascal), AMD Radeon RX 460 (GCN 4.0)
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

short_description: Survive battling waves of creatures with word weapons and powers. Rescue books and readers in danger from creatures destroying the most powerful library in the galaxy. Recover by tending bookshelves in the book sanctuary home base. Word Turtle Island is a casual rogue-lite cozy game.
